vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
πληθ-ύνω,
future -ῠνῶ[NT]: aorist ἐπλήθυνα [Refs 5th c.AD+] —causal of πληθύω, increase, multiply, [LXX+1st c.AD+]:—passive, ταῖς γυναιξὶ τὸ γάλα πληθύνεται abounds, [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__2 make multiple, 'plurify', κατὰ ἀναλογίαν [τὸ ἡνωμένον] ἐπληθύναμεν τῶν κατωτέρω πεπληθυσμένων τὸν πρῶτον πληθυσμόν Dam.[same place]; θεοὶ -όμενοι μὲν ἐν τῷ κόσμῳ, περὶ αὐτὸν δὲ ἑνοειδῶς ὄντες [Refs 4th c.AD+]
__3 intransitive, see at {πληθύω} [Refs]
__4 use the plural, [Refs 8th c.BC+]
__II passive, to be in the majority, prevail, δήμου.. χεὶρ ὅπῃ πληθύνεται (codex middle πληθύεται) [Refs 4th c.BC+]infinitive, ταύτην ἐπαινεῖν.. πληθύνομαι I follow the majority, [Refs]: perfect πεπλήθυνται [LXX]
__II.2 Grammars, [τὸ ἀπαρέμφατον] οὐ πληθύνεται the infinitive has no plural, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to increase, grow in numbers, abound
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to increase, grow in numbers, abound
optative, πληθύναι (3 singular), transitive to multiply, cause to increase, augment, 2Cor. 9:10; Heb. 6:14; passive to be multiplied, increase, be accumulated, Mt. 24:12; Acts 6:7; 7:17; intransitive to multiply, increase, be augmented, grow in number Acts 6:1
vocabInfos._es_Definition: trans. aumentar, multiplicar, esparcir (voz pasvia: a veces crecer) ; intrans. crecer, aumentar en cantidad (HCH.6:1)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 加多, 倍增
2) 被增加, 倍增, 成長
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 加多, 倍增
2) 被增加, 倍增, 成长
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: gia tâng; tăng; nhân lên. Xem G4128
